Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='YP95')

BibliographicData.Title: Corticostriatal connections of extrastriate visual areas in rhesus monkeys.

Reference.Quotation: "In case 1, the isotope injection was located in the rostral and central part of medial area 19."
"...injection was located in the caudal most portion of the lower bank of the suoperior temporal sulcus (corresponding in location to the rostral portion of area V4d, or area V4t..."
"...central part of area 19, corresponding to the ventral portion of area V4d."
"...label was observed in the caudal portion of the body of the caudate nucleus, primary in a central and lateral location, and extended into the dorsal two thirds of the genu."
"...label was observed in the caudal portion of the body of the caudate nucleus, primary in a central and lateral location, and extended into the dorsal two thirds of the genu."
"...the injection involved the central part of the preoccipital gyrus (the region of area V4)..."

"...involved the ventral part if area 19 , corresponding to the dorsal portion of area V4v(Felleman and Van Essen, 1991), and also in hte region adjacent areas V3 or VP (Newsome et al., 1986 ans VOT (Felleman and Van Essen, 1991).

"...involved the ventral part if area 19 , corresponding to the dorsal portion of area V4v(Felleman and Van Essen, 1991), and also in hte region adjacent areas V3 or VP (Newsome et al., 1986 ans VOT (Felleman and Van Essen, 1991).
"...in the region of the caudal parts of area V4v and of area V3 or VP."
"...injection was restricted to the cortex medial to the OTS (corrsponding to the lateral portion of area V2v in Felleman..."

"...injection involved the cortex around the rostral tip of the occipitotemporal sulcus, corresponding in part to area CITv and (Felleman and Van Essen, 1991) or the ventral sector of area TE2 (Seltzer and Pandya, 1978."
